review: I consulted the doctor for PCOS related issues and am  extremely satisfied and happy with the explanation, her understanding of my problems and the genuineness with which she suggested the next steps of action and preventive measures. I would definitely recommend her and will only go consult with her as long as I am in Mumbai.

I had gynaecology related issues so went to hospital. ****** *** **** ** ********** **. I would like to recommend the doctor to many people. I am satisfied with the explanation and treatment given. There was no waiting time in the hospital. It was only 5-10 minutes and Tablets were prescribed by the doctor. We took reports. Diet was suggested and she was friendly. I have plans to go again and staff were cooperative.

My wife had consulted the doctor and it was for pregnancy related. Consultation went well. We are meeting doctor every month. Delivery is on February next year. She is satisfied with the explanation given. I can definitely recommend the doctor to my family and friends. There was no waiting time when we went. Doctor is friendly. Tablets were prescribed by the doctor. Scanning was done.
Very friendly,down to earth doctor. She explains everything patiently. Thank you so so much maâ€™am you made my day.
Dr. Anagha is a very friendly doctor, I was a little nervous in the start, but once she started explaining she made everything sound very easy. I would recommend her to every1.

********* *********** ** *** **** ************ *** has deep bonding like a friend with their patients and even you can contact anytiime during your pregnancy. Some doctors will never give their contacts but Anagha Madam share their contacts from day1
